body:
This is a sub-set of #9235, including only the `rpc` and `script` dirs.

Same-binaries check:
```
$ ../bitcoin-maintainer-tools/build-for-compare.py ff58b1c3bdff5e5f687f10f9e40ce495ca49674e 1eb9d53e2d0d568b962f56085a3fd2671e776127 --executables "src/bitcoind,src/bitcoin-cli,src/bitcoin-tx"
[...]
>>> [do_build] Copying object files...
>>> [do_build] Performing basic analysis pass...
>>> [do_build] Use these commands to compare results:
>>> [do_build] $ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
>>> [do_build] $ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/ff58b1c3bdff5e5f687f10f9e40ce495ca49674e /tmp/compare/1eb9d53e2d0d568b962f56085a3fd2671e776127
$ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
d850d9029359702d388eacbec3ada682f57cd1dc336fde65184cc4843961b77b  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.1eb9d53e2d0d568b962f56085a3fd2671e776127.stripped
d850d9029359702d388eacbec3ada682f57cd1dc336fde65184cc4843961b77b  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.ff58b1c3bdff5e5f687f10f9e40ce495ca49674e.stripped
e02c1d4d682a90136e895174560eea70adfc05c81a3c2e474d96aa6c22421a15  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.1eb9d53e2d0d568b962f56085a3fd2671e776127.stripped
e02c1d4d682a90136e895174560eea70adfc05c81a3c2e474d96aa6c22421a15  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.ff58b1c3bdff5e5f687f10f9e40ce495ca49674e.stripped
c4c9cfcc54a212038dd3fb093f84846732eac1d69e5473b19ca4dc3e3dad134f  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.1eb9d53e2d0d568b962f56085a3fd2671e776127.stripped
c4c9cfcc54a212038dd3fb093f84846732eac1d69e5473b19ca4dc3e3dad134f  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.ff58b1c3bdff5e5f687f10f9e40ce495ca49674e.stripped
$ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/ff58b1c3bdff5e5f687f10f9e40ce495ca49674e /tmp/compare/1eb9d53e2d0d568b962f56085a3fd2671e776127
$ 
```

The affected files and namespaces:
```
rpc/blockchain.cpp:       std
rpc/client.cpp:           std
rpc/mining.cpp:           std
rpc/misc.cpp:             std
rpc/net.cpp:              std
rpc/protocol.cpp:         std
rpc/rawtransaction.cpp:   std
rpc/server.cpp:           RPCServer [unused], std
script/interpreter.cpp:   std
script/ismine.cpp:        std
script/script.cpp:        std
script/sign.cpp:          std
script/standard.cpp:      std
```
title: [refactor] Remove using namespace <xxx> from rpc/ & script/ sources
